title: BRIEF-Raytheon Co Says CEO Thomas Kennedy's 2017 Total Compensation Was $24.9 Mln Versus $20.5 Mln In 2016
text:
April 17, 2018 / 11:38 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Raytheon Co Says CEO Thomas Kennedy's 2017 Total Compensation Was $24.9 Mln Versus $20.5 Mln In 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Raytheon Co: 
* RAYTHEON CO SAYS CEO THOMAS A. KENNEDY’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $24.9 MILLION VERSUS $20.5 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING 
* RAYTHEON CO SAYS CFO ANTHONY F. O’BRIEN'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $5.9 MILLION VERSUS $4.7 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2H5FZGF ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
